Synopsis: Chronicles the lives of a group of midwives living in East London in the late 1950s to late 1960s.

Cast: Director:, Thomas Kail, | ,     Stars:, Lin-Manuel Miranda, , Phillipa Soo, , Leslie Odom Jr., , Renée Elise Goldsberry
Synopsis: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon

Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Amsterdam
Cast: Director:, David O. Russell, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Margot Robbie, , John David Washington, , Alessandro Nivola
Synopsis: In the 1930s, three friends witness a murder, are framed for it, and uncover one of the most outrageous plots in American history.

Title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die
Cast: Director:, Edward Bazalgette, | ,     Stars:, Mark Rowley, , Pekka Strang, , Zoltan Andrasi, , Ingrid García Jonsson
Synopsis: In the wake of King Edward's death, Uhtred of Bebbanburg and his comrades adventure across a fractured kingdom in the hopes of uniting England at last.

Title: Black Hawk Down
Cast: Director:, Ridley Scott, | ,     Stars:, Josh Hartnett, , Ewan McGregor, , Tom Sizemore, , Eric Bana
Synopsis: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

Title: The Tudors
Cast: Stars:, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, , Henry Cavill, , Anthony Brophy, , James Frain
Synopsis: A dramatic series about the reign and marriages of King Henry VIII.

Synopsis: Follow-up series to 'Vikings' set 100 years later and focusing on the adventures of Leif Erikson, Freydis, Harald Hardrada, and the Norman King William the Conqueror.

Cast: Stars:, Andrew Koji, , Olivia Cheng, , Dianne Doan, , Jason Tobin
Synopsis: During the Tong Wars in the late 1800s, Ah Sahm, a martial arts prodigy from China, immigrates to San Francisco and becomes a hatchet man for the most powerful tong in Chinatown.

Title: Prehistoric Planet
Cast: Star:, David Attenborough
Synopsis: Travel back 66 million years to when majestic dinosaurs and extraordinary creatures roamed the lands, seas, and skies.

Title: Hidden Figures
Cast: Director:, Theodore Melfi, | ,     Stars:, Taraji P. Henson, , Octavia Spencer, , Janelle Monáe, , Kevin Costner
Synopsis: The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

Title: Dunkirk
Cast: Director:, Christopher Nolan, | ,     Stars:, Fionn Whitehead, , Barry Keoghan, , Mark Rylance, , Tom Hardy
Synopsis: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

Title: The Big Short
Cast: Director:, Adam McKay, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Steve Carell, , Ryan Gosling, , Brad Pitt
Synopsis: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

Title: Braveheart
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Mel Gibson, , Sophie Marceau, , Patrick McGoohan, , Angus Macfadyen
Synopsis: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Title: Firebrand
Cast: Director:, Karim Aïnouz, | ,     Stars:, Alicia Vikander, , Jude Law, , Eddie Marsan, , Sam Riley
Synopsis: Follows Queen Catherine Parr and Henry VIII's marriage.

Title: Flamin' Hot
Cast: Director:, Eva Longoria, | ,     Stars:, Jesse Garcia, , Annie Gonzalez, , Emilio Rivera, , Vanessa Martinez
Synopsis: This is the inspiring true story of Richard Montañez who as a Frito Lay janitor disrupted the food industry by channeling his Mexican heritage to turn Flamin' Hot Cheetos from a snack into an iconic global pop culture phenomenon.

Title: Call the Midwife
Cast: Stars:, Vanessa Redgrave, , Laura Main, , Jenny Agutter, , Stephen McGann
Synopsis: Chronicles the lives of a group of midwives living in East London in the late 1950s to late 1960s.

Title: Hamilton
Cast: Director:, Thomas Kail, | ,     Stars:, Lin-Manuel Miranda, , Phillipa Soo, , Leslie Odom Jr., , Renée Elise Goldsberry
Synopsis: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Transatlantic
Cast: Stars:, Gillian Jacobs, , Lucas Englander, , Cory Michael Smith, , Corey Stoll
Synopsis: An American journalist who spent 13 months in France 1940-41 managed to arrange safe passage to the US for over 2,000 refugees; who were in danger of losing their lives.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon
Cast: Director:, Damien Chazelle, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Margot Robbie, , Jean Smart, , Olivia Wilde
Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: The Days
Cast: Stars:, Kôji Yakusho, , Oji Suzuka, , Kaoru Kobayashi, , Yuriko Ishida
Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: She Said
Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan

Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Synopsis: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

Title: Braveheart
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Mel Gibson, , Sophie Marceau, , Patrick McGoohan, , Angus Macfadyen
Synopsis: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Cast: Director:, Eva Longoria, | ,     Stars:, Jesse Garcia, , Annie Gonzalez, , Emilio Rivera, , Vanessa Martinez
Synopsis: This is the inspiring true story of Richard Montañez who as a Frito Lay janitor disrupted the food industry by channeling his Mexican heritage to turn Flamin' Hot Cheetos from a snack into an iconic global pop culture phenomenon.

Title: Call the Midwife
Cast: Stars:, Vanessa Redgrave, , Laura Main, , Jenny Agutter, , Stephen McGann
Synopsis: Chronicles the lives of a group of midwives living in East London in the late 1950s to late 1960s.

Title: Hamilton
Cast: Director:, Thomas Kail, | ,     Stars:, Lin-Manuel Miranda, , Phillipa Soo, , Leslie Odom Jr., , Renée Elise Goldsberry
Synopsis: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Transatlantic
Cast: Stars:, Gillian Jacobs, , Lucas Englander, , Cory Michael Smith, , Corey Stoll
Synopsis: An American journalist who spent 13 months in France 1940-41 managed to arrange safe passage to the US for over 2,000 refugees; who were in danger of losing their lives.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon
Cast: Director:, Damien Chazelle, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Margot Robbie, , Jean Smart, , Olivia Wilde
Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: The Days
Cast: Stars:, Kôji Yakusho, , Oji Suzuka, , Kaoru Kobayashi, , Yuriko Ishida
Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: She Said
Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan

Synopsis: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the United States mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

Title: Braveheart
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Mel Gibson, , Sophie Marceau, , Patrick McGoohan, , Angus Macfadyen
Synopsis: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

Title: Firebrand
Cast: Director:, Karim Aïnouz, | ,     Stars:, Alicia Vikander, , Jude Law, , Eddie Marsan, , Sam Riley
Synopsis: Follows Queen Catherine Parr and Henry VIII's marriage.

Title: Flamin' Hot
Cast: Director:, Eva Longoria, | ,     Stars:, Jesse Garcia, , Annie Gonzalez, , Emilio Rivera, , Vanessa Martinez
Synopsis: This is the inspiring true story of Richard Montañez who as a Frito Lay janitor disrupted the food industry by channeling his Mexican heritage to turn Flamin' Hot Cheetos from a snack into an iconic global pop culture phenomenon.

Title: Call the Midwife
Cast: Stars:, Vanessa Redgrave, , Laura Main, , Jenny Agutter, , Stephen McGann
Synopsis: Chronicles the lives of a group of midwives living in East London in the late 1950s to late 1960s.

Title: Hamilton
Cast: Director:, Thomas Kail, | ,     Stars:, Lin-Manuel Miranda, , Phillipa Soo, , Leslie Odom Jr., , Renée Elise Goldsberry
Synopsis: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Transatlantic
Cast: Stars:, Gillian Jacobs, , Lucas Englander, , Cory Michael Smith, , Corey Stoll
Synopsis: An American journalist who spent 13 months in France 1940-41 managed to arrange safe passage to the US for over 2,000 refugees; who were in danger of losing their lives.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon
Cast: Director:, Damien Chazelle, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Margot Robbie, , Jean Smart, , Olivia Wilde
Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: The Days
Cast: Stars:, Kôji Yakusho, , Oji Suzuka, , Kaoru Kobayashi, , Yuriko Ishida
Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: She Said
Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan
Synopsis: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.

Title: Chernobyl
Cast: Stars:, Jessie Buckley, , Jared Harris, , Stellan Skarsgård, , Adam Nagaitis
Synopsis: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

Synopsis: In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime.

Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: Bheed

Synopsis: The toughest times people had to face just to reach their homes.

Synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Caligula

Synopsis: A dramatization of the ascent to Caesar and subsequent reign of Caligula, one of the most notorious leaders of ancient Rome. We see his ambition, his scheming, his perversion and decadence, his brutality and his lunacy.

Title: The Chosen
Cast: Stars:, Shahar Isaac, , Jonathan Roumie, , Paras Patel, , Elizabeth Tabish
Synopsis: A charismatic fisherman struggling with debt. A troubled woman wrestling with demons. A gifted accountant ostracised from his family and people. Synopsis: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

Title: Transatlantic
Cast: Stars:, Gillian Jacobs, , Lucas Englander, , Cory Michael Smith, , Corey Stoll
Synopsis: An American journalist who spent 13 months in France 1940-41 managed to arrange safe passage to the US for over 2,000 refugees; who were in danger of losing their lives.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Queen Charlotte: A Bridgerton Story
Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon
Cast: Director:, Damien Chazelle, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Margot Robbie, , Jean Smart, , Olivia Wilde
Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: The Days
Cast: Stars:, Kôji Yakusho, , Oji Suzuka, , Kaoru Kobayashi, , Yuriko Ishida
Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: She Said
Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan
Synopsis: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.

Title: Chernobyl
Cast: Stars:, Jessie Buckley, , Jared Harris, , Stellan Skarsgård, , Adam Nagaitis
Synopsis: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

Title: Perry Mason
Cast: Stars:, Matthew Rhys, , Juliet Rylance, , Chris Chalk, , Shea Whigham
Synopsis: In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime.

Title: Tombstone
Cast: Directors:, George P. Cosmatos, , Kevin Jarre, | ,     Stars:, Kurt Russell, , Val Kilmer, , Sam Elliott, , Bill Paxton
Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Title: Bheed
Cast: Director:, Anubhav Sinha, | ,     Stars:, Rajkummar Rao, , Pankaj Kapur, , Bhumi Pednekar, , Aditya Srivastav
Synopsis: The toughest times people had to face just to reach their homes.

Title: Schindler's List
Cast: Director:, Steven Spielberg, | ,     Stars:, Liam Neeson, , Ralph Fiennes, , Ben Kingsley, , Caroline Goodall
Synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Caligula
Cast: Director:, Tinto Brass, | ,     Stars:, Malcolm McDowell, , Peter O'Toole, , Helen Mirren, , Teresa Ann Savoy
Synopsis: A dramatization of the ascent to Caesar and subsequent reign of Caligula, one of the most notorious leaders of ancient Rome. We see his ambition, his scheming, his perversion and decadence, his brutality and his lunacy.

Title: The Chosen
Cast: Stars:, Shahar Isaac, , Jonathan Roumie, , Paras Patel, , Elizabeth Tabish
Synopsis: A charismatic fisherman struggling with debt. A troubled woman wrestling with demons. A gifted accountant ostracised from his family and people. In this ground-breaking first season of The Chosen see how Jesus reaches each of these and more as He works His first miracles and embarks on His ministry to change the world. See Him through the eyes of those who knew Him.

Title: The Northman
Cast: Director:, Robert Eggers, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Skarsgård, , Nicole Kidman, , Claes Bang, , Ethan Hawke
Synopsis: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

Title: The Woman King
Cast: Director:, Gina Prince-Bythewood, | ,     Stars:, Viola Davis, , Thuso Mbedu, , Lashana Lynch, , Sheila Atim
Synopsis: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.

Title: Sound of Freedom
Cast: Director:, Alejandro Monteverde, | ,     Stars:, Jim Caviezel, , Mira Sorvino, , Kurt Fuller, , Bill Camp
Synopsis: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from sex traffickers.

Title: Deadwood
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Ian McShane, , Molly Parker, , Brad Dourif
Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Amsterdam
Cast: Director:, David O. Russell, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Margot Robbie, , John David Washington, , Alessandro Nivola

Title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die

Synopsis: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Cast: Stars:, India Amarteifio, , Adjoa Andoh, , Michelle Fairley, , Ruth Gemmell
Synopsis: Betrothed against her will to King George, young Charlotte arrives in London on her wedding day and faces scrutiny from the monarch's cunning mother.

Title: White House Plumbers
Cast: Stars:, Woody Harrelson, , Justin Theroux, , Lena Headey, , Domhnall Gleeson
Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon

Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan

Title: The Chosen
Cast: Stars:, Shahar Isaac, , Jonathan Roumie, , Paras Patel, , Elizabeth Tabish
Synopsis: A charismatic fisherman struggling with debt. A troubled woman wrestling with demons. A gifted accountant ostracised from his family and people. Synopsis: A five-part series that tells the true story of how Nixon's own political saboteurs and Watergate masterminds, E. Howard Hunt and G. Gordon Liddy, accidentally toppled the presidency they were trying to protect.

Title: The Great
Cast: Stars:, Elle Fanning, , Phoebe Fox, , Gwilym Lee, , Adam Godley
Synopsis: A royal woman living in rural Russia during the 18th century is forced to choose between her own personal happiness and the future of Russia, when she marries an Emperor.

Title: Band of Brothers
Cast: Stars:, Scott Grimes, , Damian Lewis, , Ron Livingston, , Shane Taylor
Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon
Cast: Director:, Damien Chazelle, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Margot Robbie, , Jean Smart, , Olivia Wilde
Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: The Days
Cast: Stars:, Kôji Yakusho, , Oji Suzuka, , Kaoru Kobayashi, , Yuriko Ishida
Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: She Said
Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan
Synopsis: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.

Synopsis: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Synopsis: The toughest times people had to face just to reach their homes.

Title: Schindler's List
Cast: Director:, Steven Spielberg, | ,     Stars:, Liam Neeson, , Ralph Fiennes, , Ben Kingsley, , Caroline Goodall
Synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Caligula

Synopsis: A dramatization of the ascent to Caesar and subsequent reign of Caligula, one of the most notorious leaders of ancient Rome. We see his ambition, his scheming, his perversion and decadence, his brutality and his lunacy.

Title: The Chosen
Cast: Stars:, Shahar Isaac, , Jonathan Roumie, , Paras Patel, , Elizabeth Tabish
Synopsis: A charismatic fisherman struggling with debt. A troubled woman wrestling with demons. A gifted accountant ostracised from his family and people. In this ground-breaking first season of The Chosen see how Jesus reaches each of these and more as He works His first miracles and embarks on His ministry to change the world. See Him through the eyes of those who knew Him.

Title: The Northman
Cast: Director:, Robert Eggers, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Skarsgård, , Nicole Kidman, , Claes Bang, , Ethan Hawke
Synopsis: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

Title: The Woman King
Cast: Director:, Gina Prince-Bythewood, | ,     Stars:, Viola Davis, , Thuso Mbedu, , Lashana Lynch, , Sheila Atim
Synopsis: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.

Title: Sound of Freedom
Cast: Director:, Alejandro Monteverde, | ,     Stars:, Jim Caviezel, , Mira Sorvino, , Kurt Fuller, , Bill Camp
Synopsis: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from sex traffickers.

Title: Deadwood

Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Amsterdam
Cast: Director:, David O. Russell, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Margot Robbie, , John David Washington, , Alessandro Nivola

Title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die

Synopsis: In the wake of King Edward's death, Uhtred of Bebbanburg and his comrades adventure across a fractured kingdom in the hopes of uniting England at last.

Synopsis: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

Synopsis: The story of Easy Company of the U.S. Army 101st Airborne Division and their mission in World War II Europe, from Operation Overlord to V-J Day.

Title: A Small Light
Cast: Stars:, Bel Powley, , Joe Cole, , Amira Casar, , Billie Boullet
Synopsis: Follows the remarkable story of Miep Gies, a Dutch woman who risked her life to shelter Anne Frank's family from the Nazis for more than two years during World War II.

Title: Bridgerton
Cast: Stars:, Nicola Coughlan, , Julie Andrews, , Luke Newton, , Luke Thompson
Synopsis: Wealth, lust and betrayal set against the backdrop of Regency-era England, seen through the eyes of the powerful Bridgerton family.

Title: BlackBerry
Cast: Director:, Matt Johnson, | ,     Stars:, Jay Baruchel, , Glenn Howerton, , Matt Johnson, , Kelly Van der Burg
Synopsis: The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.

Title: The Last Kingdom
Cast: Stars:, Alexander Dreymon, , Eliza Butterworth, , Arnas Fedaravicius, , Mark Rowley
Synopsis: As Alfred the Great defends his kingdom from Norse invaders, Uhtred--born a Saxon but raised by Vikings--seeks to claim his ancestral birthright.

Title: The Zone of Interest
Cast: Director:, Jonathan Glazer, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Christian Friedel, , Ralph Herforth, , Max Beck
Synopsis: The commandant of Auschwitz, Rudolf Höss, and his wife Hedwig, strive to build a dream life for their family in a house and garden next to the camp.

Title: Vikings
Cast: Stars:, Katheryn Winnick, , Gustaf Skarsgård, , Alexander Ludwig, , Georgia Hirst
Synopsis: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.

Title: The Gallows Pole
Cast: Stars:, Jordan Preston, , Nicole Barber-Lane, , Stevie Binns, , Samuel Edward-Cook
Synopsis: Follows Hartley as he assembles a gang of weavers and land-workers for a criminal enterprise that will capsize the economy and become the biggest fraud in British history.

Title: Vinland Saga
Cast: Stars:, Yûto Uemura, , Mike Haimoto, , Alejandro Saab, , Aleks Le
Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?

Title: Babylon
Cast: Director:, Damien Chazelle, | ,     Stars:, Brad Pitt, , Margot Robbie, , Jean Smart, , Olivia Wilde
Synopsis: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, it traces the rise and fall of multiple characters during an era of unbridled decadence and depravity in early Hollywood.

Title: The Crown
Cast: Stars:, Claire Foy, , Olivia Colman, , Imelda Staunton, , Matt Smith
Synopsis: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II's reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

Title: The Days
Cast: Stars:, Kôji Yakusho, , Oji Suzuka, , Kaoru Kobayashi, , Yuriko Ishida
Synopsis: Blamed by some, hailed as heroes by others, those involved with Fukushima Daiichi face a deadly, invisible threat an unprecedented nuclear disaster.

Title: Shooting Stars
Cast: Director:, Chris Robinson, | ,     Stars:, Marquis Mookie Cook, , Wood Harris, , Caleb McLaughlin, , Avery Serell Wills Jr.
Synopsis: A look at the young life of basketball star LeBron James. Feature film adaptation of LeBron James and Buzz Bissinger's book 'Shooting Stars'.

Title: Jeanne du Barry
Cast: Director:, Maïwenn, | ,     Stars:, Maïwenn, , Johnny Depp, , Benjamin Lavernhe, , Melvil Poupaud
Synopsis: The life of Jeanne Bécu who was born as the illegitimate daughter of an impoverished seamstress in 1743 and went on to rise through the Court of Louis XV to become his last official mistress.

Title: Hacksaw Ridge
Cast: Director:, Mel Gibson, | ,     Stars:, Andrew Garfield, , Sam Worthington, , Luke Bracey, , Teresa Palmer
Synopsis: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

Title: Tetris
Cast: Director:, Jon S. Baird, | ,     Stars:, Taron Egerton, , Mara Huf, , Miles Barrow, , Rick Yune
Synopsis: The story of how one of the world's most popular video games found its way to players around the globe. Businessman Henk Rogers and Tetris inventor Alexey Pajitnov join forces in the USSR, risking it all to bring Tetris to the masses.

Title: She Said
Cast: Director:, Maria Schrader, | ,     Stars:, Lola Petticrew, , Katherine Laheen, , Zoe Kazan, , Carey Mulligan
Synopsis: New York Times reporters Megan Twohey and Jodi Kantor break one of the most important stories in a generation - a story that helped ignite a movement and shattered decades of silence around the subject of sexual assault in Hollywood.

Title: Chernobyl

Synopsis: In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.

Synopsis: In booming 1932 Los Angeles, a down-and-out defense attorney takes on the case of a lifetime.

Synopsis: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

Synopsis: The toughest times people had to face just to reach their homes.

Title: Schindler's List

Synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

Title: Caligula
Cast: Director:, Tinto Brass, | ,     Stars:, Malcolm McDowell, , Peter O'Toole, , Helen Mirren, , Teresa Ann Savoy
Synopsis: A dramatization of the ascent to Caesar and subsequent reign of Caligula, one of the most notorious leaders of ancient Rome. We see his ambition, his scheming, his perversion and decadence, his brutality and his lunacy.

Title: The Chosen
Cast: Stars:, Shahar Isaac, , Jonathan Roumie, , Paras Patel, , Elizabeth Tabish
Synopsis: A charismatic fisherman struggling with debt. A troubled woman wrestling with demons. A gifted accountant ostracised from his family and people. In this ground-breaking first season of The Chosen see how Jesus reaches each of these and more as He works His first miracles and embarks on His ministry to change the world. See Him through the eyes of those who knew Him.

Title: The Northman
Cast: Director:, Robert Eggers, | ,     Stars:, Alexander Skarsgård, , Nicole Kidman, , Claes Bang, , Ethan Hawke
Synopsis: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

Title: The Woman King
Cast: Director:, Gina Prince-Bythewood, | ,     Stars:, Viola Davis, , Thuso Mbedu, , Lashana Lynch, , Sheila Atim
Synopsis: A historical epic inspired by true events that took place in The Kingdom of Dahomey, one of the most powerful states of Africa in the 18th and 19th centuries.

Title: Sound of Freedom
Cast: Director:, Alejandro Monteverde, | ,     Stars:, Jim Caviezel, , Mira Sorvino, , Kurt Fuller, , Bill Camp
Synopsis: The incredible true story of a former government agent turned vigilante who embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue hundreds of children from sex traffickers.

Title: Deadwood
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Ian McShane, , Molly Parker, , Brad Dourif
Synopsis: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

Title: Amsterdam
Cast: Director:, David O. Russell, | ,     Stars:, Christian Bale, , Margot Robbie, , John David Washington, , Alessandro Nivola
Synopsis: In the 1930s, three friends witness a murder, are framed for it, and uncover one of the most outrageous plots in American history.

Title: The Last Kingdom: Seven Kings Must Die
Cast: Director:, Edward Bazalgette, | ,     Stars:, Mark Rowley, , Pekka Strang, , Zoltan Andrasi, , Ingrid García Jonsson
Synopsis: In the wake of King Edward's death, Uhtred of Bebbanburg and his comrades adventure across a fractured kingdom in the hopes of uniting England at last.

Title: Black Hawk Down
Cast: Director:, Ridley Scott, | ,     Stars:, Josh Hartnett, , Ewan McGregor, , Tom Sizemore, , Eric Bana
Synopsis: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

Synopsis: Thorfinn pursues a journey with his father's killer in order to take revenge and end his life in a duel as an honorable warrior and pay his father a homage.
